title: Obama fonts (that aren't Gotham or Perpetua or Trajan, I swear)
content:
Doing a little civic participation through graphic design and would like to find two fonts:

(1) the classy script from which swashes have been taken to make the super-swash

(2) the “AMERICAN” serif; through the pixelation it looks like one of the Fleischmann revivals, but who knows (you know!)

Thanks in advance, everyone
